title: Herbert Busemann
summary: Herbert Busemann (12 May 1905 â€“ 3 February 1994) was a German-American mathematician specializing in convex and differential geometry.  He is the author of Busemann's theorem in Euclidean geometry and geometric tomography.  He was a member of the Royal Danish Academy and a winner of the Lobachevsky Medal (1985), the first American mathematician to receive it.[1]  He was also a Fulbright scholar in New Zealand in 1952.[2]
